name: Tuscan Chicken Burger
description: A burger with a Tuscan flair! Garlic, chunks of pepper and tomatoes, and sumac flavour juicy chicken patties that are tucked between pillowy buns. We aren’t clowning around with the big burger sauce, because this version has big flavour and it’s better for you, made at home. Delicious served with Zucchini Fries.

ingredients.name: Tuscan Chicken Burger Seasoning or Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning

preparation: In a large bowl, combine ground chicken and seasoning until well blended. Form into four patties.
Grill, with lid closed, 6 min per side or until cooked. Add cheese for the last 1 min of cooking, if using.
Meanwhile in a bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sauce mix, ketchup, and relish.
Tuck burgers into buns and serve with sauce and toppings.
tips: For a light bite, swap chicken for four large portobello mushroom caps; brush with olive oil and sprinkle with seasoning. Grill until tender.
Swap lean ground beef for chicken or turkey.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies, your choice.
